statements.text: You've obtained the Paladin's Toxic Masculinity Sweat!
You obtain a few droplets of Jonathan’s profuse J U S T I C E  S W E A T.

statements.speaker: Sir_Jonathan
statements.text: ...I don’t know if I am capable of feeling happiness.
You received The Paladin’s Existential Sweat!

statements.speaker: Bard
statements.text: As the sun goes down, on this Blue night.

statements.speaker: Bard
statements.text: A friend cries eternal, tears for the knight.

statements.speaker: Bard
statements.text: A solemn hymn, for a solid him.

statements.speaker: Bard
statements.text: A moment grim, from the Reaper’s whim.
You stomached The Bard’s Requiem!
Saint Casey heals you with her Cleric magic.
You receive "Cleric's Blessing"!
And also you stop bleeding!
Sir Jonathan’s soul rests and finds eternal peace as a Purple tear slides down Saint Casey’s face.

statements.speaker: Casey_The_Cleric
statements.text: Rest easy...friend.
You obtain "Cleric's Mourning"
Saint Casey begins to speak in tongues as darkness suffocates the sky. The clouds are split asunder, as a primordial moan echoes across space and time.
Saint Casey has broken her holy vow.
You have obtained an Evil Cleric's Aura!
Saint Casey begins to speak in tongues as darkness suffocates the sky. For a brief moment, Sir Jonathan can be heard screaming "Put me back!"
Saint Casey has broken her holy vow.
You have obtained a Cursed Cleric's Aura
